semantic_description: Database call spans for stored-procedure executions in the CLM/eSign services are missing the stored-procedure name as an attribute.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the SqlCommand.CommandText value when CommandType == StoredProcedure

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the current database name retrieved from SqlConnection.Database
